title: Know about the ETF fundamentals and its benefits as per the ETF specialist (Matthew Stromberg)
text: By Matthew Stromberg Aug 15, 2015 Presently, ETF is the highest mode of investment not only in America but also at many other places apart from America. People now rely upon investment in exchange traded fund more than any other modes of investment especially stock and normal mutual funds. This is the reason that now a noticeable growth has been seen in the number of candidates investing in ETF. But this is very important for these individuals to know the basic ETF fundamentals before entering the market of investments. This has been seen that many individuals who are not aware of the basics also try out their luck in exchange traded fund and this can be a point that can lead the investors to loss.Essential points to know about exchange traded fundThere are a number of things that an individual should take care of before he or she starts the investment plan in ETF. Though it is an excellent idea to hire an advisor for investment in ETF, but still before investing there are some important points that you should be aware of. These advisors also take advises from somewhere so that they can offer you the best advice for your investments. ETF Strategist is the source that can provide various ideas after studying the market strategies.ETFs are like mutual funds but these are lesser riskier than the actual mutual funds. You can find ETF operating in almost various different types of products. By now there are as many as 1500 ETF items in the market and each year more than 150 ETF items get launched for investment purpose. This is due to the increasing amount of exchange traded fund products and the various benefits offered by the ETF that more and more people are now investing in ETF. To make the investment easier and securer now there are a number of expert advisors and specialists who help people in taking the correct decisions at the correct times.Various benefits involved in ETF investmentThere are a number of visible benefits that make investment in exchange traded fund the best one by now. The very first benefit of ETF investment that people love is its low cost. It is cheaper than the mutual funds even and hence it is an attractive investment mode for the individuals today. If compare with equity mutual fund, then ETF cost about just one-third of it.Other two major benefits that make investment in ETF an efficient one is its transparency and its tax efficiency. ETF has no hidden charges or cost as many other investment modes. It is very much transparent and hence it is a common investment choice on which people can rely. Also ETFs are very much tax efficient, that is another major reason why now people chose investment in ETF in comparison to any other investment choices.These are some of the various reasons why ETF investment has gained high amount of exposure in the market and that also in a small span of time. Also due to the growing popularity of the term and the number of benefits offered, each day many individuals are turning towards investing in ETF in comparison to other investment ideas. About the Author The author is an ETF Strategist and understands well the various market strategies. Here in this article the author explains the benefits of investing in ETF along with the various ETF fundamentals . Rating:
